alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 21 at 9:20PM AKST until January 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING FOR TURNAGAIN ARM AND HIGHER ELEVATIONS... * WHAT...Southeast winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Turnagain Arm and higher elevations. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
